PunishmentUntil.description: headline for a temporary punishment stating the timezone

Filename.description: The word 'filename'. The name of a file

UserNote.description: The word 'usernote'. This is a feature to share hidden guild-wide notes of a user with other moderators.

UserNotes.description: The plural word 'usernote'. This is a feature to share hidden guild-wide notes of a user with other moderators.

UserMap.description: The word 'usermap'. This is a feature to share hidden guild-wide connections of two users with other moderators.

UserMaps.description: The plural word 'usermaps'. This is a feature to share hidden guild-wide connections of two users with other moderators.

UserMapBetween.description: Describes a usermap between two users.

Public.description: Webhook notification for modcase creation. This does not disclose information about the moderator.

Internal.description: Webhook notification for modcase creation. This does disclose information about the moderator.
Internal.en: A **Modcase** for <@{modCase.UserId}> ({modCase.Username}#{modCase.Discriminator}) has been created by <@{moderator.Id}> ({moderator.Username}#{moderator.Discriminator}).

Public.description: Webhook notification for modcase update. This does not disclose information about the moderator.

Internal.description: Webhook notification for modcase update. This does disclose information about the moderator.
Internal.en: A **Modcase** for <@{modCase.UserId}> ({modCase.Username}#{modCase.Discriminator}) has been updated by <@{moderator.Id}> ({moderator.Username}#{moderator.Discriminator}).

Public.description: Webhook notification for modcase deletion. This does not disclose information about the moderator.

Internal.description: Webhook notification for modcase deletion. This does disclose information about the moderator.
Internal.en: A **Modcase** for <@{modCase.UserId}> ({modCase.Username}#{modCase.Discriminator}) has been deleted by <@{moderator.Id}> ({moderator.Username}#{moderator.Discriminator}).

Create.description: A modcase comment has been created.

Update.description: A modcase comment has been updated.

Delete.description: A modcase comment has been deleted.

Create.description: A modcase comment has been created.

Update.description: A modcase comment has been updated.

Delete.description: A modcase comment has been deleted.

Create.description: Webhook notification for modcase file creation.

Delete.description: Webhook notification for modcase file deletion.

Update.description: Webhook notification for modcase file update.

Warn.description: DM notification for warn modcase. This does not disclose information about the moderator.
Warn.en:
The moderators of guild `{guild.Name}` have warned you.
For more information or rehabilitation visit: {serviceBaseUrl}
Warn.de:
Die Moderatoren von `{guild.Name}` haben dich verwarnt.
Für weitere Informationen besuche: {serviceBaseUrl}

Temp.description: DM notification for temp mute modcase. This does not disclose information about the moderator.
Temp.en:
The moderators of guild `{guild.Name}` have temporarily muted you until {modCase.PunishedUntil.Value.ToDiscordTS()}.
For more information or rehabilitation visit: {serviceBaseUrl}
Temp.de:
Die Moderatoren von `{guild.Name}` haben dich temporär stummgeschalten bis {modCase.PunishedUntil.Value.ToDiscordTS()}.
Für weitere Informationen besuche: {serviceBaseUrl}

Perm.description: DM notification for perm mute modcase. This does not disclose information about the moderator.
Perm.en:
The moderators of guild `{guild.Name}` have muted you.
For more information or rehabilitation visit: {serviceBaseUrl}
Perm.de:
Die Moderatoren von `{guild.Name}` haben dich stummgeschalten.
Für weitere Informationen besuche: {serviceBaseUrl}

Temp.description: DM notification for temp ban modcase. This does not disclose information about the moderator.
Temp.en:
The moderators of guild `{guild.Name}` have temporarily banned you until {modCase.PunishedUntil.Value.ToDiscordTS()}.
For more information or rehabilitation visit: {serviceBaseUrl}
Temp.de:
Die Moderatoren von `{guild.Name}` haben dich temporär gebannt bis {modCase.PunishedUntil.Value.ToDiscordTS()}.
Für weitere Informationen besuche: {serviceBaseUrl}

Perm.description: DM notification for perm ban modcase. This does not disclose information about the moderator.
Perm.en:
The moderators of guild `{guild.Name}` have banned you.
For more information or rehabilitation visit: {serviceBaseUrl}
Perm.de:
Die Moderatoren von `{guild.Name}` haben dich gebannt.
Für weitere Informationen besuche: {serviceBaseUrl}

Kick.description: DM notification for kick modcase. This does not disclose information about the moderator.
Kick.en:
The moderators of guild `{guild.Name}` have kicked you.
For more information or rehabilitation visit: {serviceBaseUrl}
Kick.de:
Die Moderatoren von `{guild.Name}` haben dich kickt.
Für weitere Informationen besuche: {serviceBaseUrl}

DescriptionThanks.en:
Thanks for registering your guild.
In the following you will learn some useful tips for setting up and using **MASZ**.
DescriptionThanks.de:
Vielen Dank für deine Registrierung.
In den folgenden Tipps wirst du einige nützliche Tipps zum Einrichten und Verwenden von **MASZ** erhalten.

UseFeaturesCommand.description: Use the `features` command to see the features of MASZ.
UseFeaturesCommand.en: Use the `/features` command to test if your current guild setup supports all features of **MASZ**.
UseFeaturesCommand.de: Benutze den `/features` Befehl um zu sehen welche Features von **MASZ** dein aktuelles Setup unterstützt.

DefaultLanguageUsed.description: The default language is used for the guild.
DefaultLanguageUsed.en: MASZ will use `{language}` as default language for this guild.
DefaultLanguageUsed.de: MASZ wird `{language}` als Standard-Sprache für diese Gilde verwenden.

ConfusingTimestamps.en:
Timezones can be confusing.
MASZ uses a Discord feature to display timestamps in the local timezone of your computer/phone.
ConfusingTimestamps.de:
Zeitzonen können kompliziert sein.
MASZ benutzt ein Discord-Feature um Zeitstempel in der lokalen Zeitzone deines Computers/Handys anzuzeigen.

Support.description: Support for MASZ is provided by the [MASZ Support Server](https://discord.gg/5zjpzw6h3S).
Support.en: Please refer to the [MASZ Support Server](https://discord.gg/5zjpzw6h3S) for further questions.
Support.de: Bitte wende dich an den [MASZ Support Server](https://discord.gg/5zjpzw6h3S) für weitere Fragen.
